system.description: Automatically equipped in each empty hand slot.

Soul Beads can appear in various forms: glowing segments on a mala, marks on your skin, or floating orbs circling your body — how do yours manifest?

  • Your Soul Bead limit equals half your WLP die size, with a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 6.

  • You begin a conflict with a full set of Core Soul Beads. These Beads don’t count toward the Clarity Skill.

  • Once you start spending your Core Soul Beads, you gain 2 Resolve Soul Beads per turn, up to your Soul Bead limit.

Soul Beads can appear in various forms: glowing segments on a mala, marks on your skin, or floating orbs circling your body — how do yours manifest?

  • Your Soul Bead limit equals half your WLP die size, with a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 6.

  • You begin a conflict with a full set of Core Soul Beads. These Beads don’t count toward the Clarity Skill.

  • Once you start spending your Core Soul Beads, you gain 2 Resolve Soul Beads per turn, up to your Soul Bead limit.

summary.value: One creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (10 Air, 10 Bolt, 10 Earth, 10 Fire, or 10 Ice).

system.description:
For 2 Inventory Points, one creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice).

  • Target Suffers: @DMG[10 air], @DMG[10 bolt], @DMG[10 earth], @DMG[10 fire], or @DMG[10 ice]

summary.value: This allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.

system.description: For 4 Inventory Points, this allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.
For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 hp].

summary.value: One creature recovers from a single status effect.

system.description: For 2 Inventory Points, one creature recovers from a single status effect.
For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 mp].

summary.value: Balance and resolve are the riverbed of strength.

system.description:
ALSO: Ascetic, Sage, Shīfù

Monks are masters of mind, body, and spirit, using their inner clarity to achieve supernatural feats. Through rigorous discipline, they can harness raw spiritual might to endure adversity, aid their allies, and strike with precision. Monks seek to maintain balance — within themselves and in the world around them — believing that true strength lies not in mastering combat, but in understanding the nature of conﬂict itself. Some monks choose solitude to perfect their discipline, while others act as conduits to harmonious living, helping the world around them.

MONK FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Mind Points by 5.
  • Gain the ability to equip martial ranged weapons and martial melee weapons.

MONK SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.SzsNaeREQGUpeo9u]{Clarity} (SL3)

For each pair of active Resolve Soul Beads you possess, choose one of these cumulative benefits:

  • Immunity to a chosen status effect.
  • Your attacks or spells of a chosen damage type ignore Resistances.
  • You gain Resistance to a chosen damage type.

The number of bonuses you can have active at any given moment is equal to 【SL】. You cannot select the same benefit more than once.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.a65UYj7NaS0pgz7d]{Resonant Clarity} (SL3)

Your unwavering resolve and mental clarity radiate outward, reaching your companions. For each 【SL】, you can share one of your active benefits from the Clarity Skill, up to three creatures.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.t3eHGb1h2RBfCDye]{Soul Renewal}

Choose up to three creatures. As an action, release your Soul Beads towards them, spending 2 MP per Bead. Each delivered Bead restores 10 HP or MP, at your discretion. At level 20, the regeneration increases to 12 HP/MP per Bead, and at level 40, to 15 HP/MP per Bead. Each Bead released in this way is destroyed.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.FKruofSyld8CMxOe]{Spirit Shot} (SL2)

As an action, choose any number of Soul Beads to release in a ranged attack against enemies, spending 2 MP per Bead. Perform a 【DEX + WLP】 Check. On a hit, each target loses 【SL × 4】 HP or MP per Bead, based on your choice. This damage ignores Resistances.

Beads targeting HP aﬀect the target’s Defense, while those targeting MP aﬀect their Magic Defense. Each Bead is destroyed after release, whether it hits or not.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.WaJj04PEIogLmwx4]{Spiritual Fortress} (SL3)

As a reaction, release any number of Soul Beads to reduce incoming damage to you or up to three creatures by
【SL × 2】, before applying any damage Aﬃnities. Each Bead destroyed this way costs 2 MP.

SOUL BEADS

Soul Beads can appear in various forms: glowing segments on a mala, marks on your skin, or ﬂoating orbs circling your body — how do yours manifest?

  • Your Soul Bead limit equals half your Willpower die size, with a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 6.

  • You begin a conflict with a full set of Core Soul Beads. These Beads don’t count toward the Clarity Skill.

  • Once you start releasing your Core Soul Beads, you gain 2 Resolve Soul Beads per turn, up to your Soul Bead limit.

HEROIC SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.rdWGGszxm27eUBed]{Crystal Clear}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.xjiGIzpgP523NAV7]{Beaded Weapon}

CREDIT

Class referenced from The Low Fantasy Atlas by Breno A. H. Marisguia

summary.value: The cold between the stars... it does not frighten me.

system.description:
ALSO: Astromancer, Chaos Mage, Gambler

High above the stars, where their lights do not shine, lies a bottomless void where life and souls wither and transform in unfathomable ways. This realm is a non-reality, an endless expanse of chaos impervious to the laws of time, space, and probability. Entropists refer to this realm as the Cosmos, the Heavens, or quite simply as Lady Luck: they are among the few gifted with the ability to channel its reality-bending energies.

ENTROPIST FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Mind Points by 5.
  • You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Ritualism discipline.

ENTROPIST SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.jgGLuOvN8xCSQWLK]{Absorb MP} (SL5)

After you suffer damage, you may immediately recover 【SL × 2】 Mind Points.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.vtmxLTltA4JvXFXu]{Entropic Magic} (SL10)

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Entropist spell (see Core Rulebook, page 192).

Offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) Entropist spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.HgxY0x6jUjS6ppBc]{Lucky Seven}

You have a lucky number; at the beginning of each session, that number is 7. Once per scene after you perform a Check, you may replace the value shown on one of the dice you rolled with your lucky number (even if this would give an impossible Result, such as a value of 7 on a d6). If you do, the replaced value becomes your new lucky number.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Ko2QCUw6qbxhufwE]{Ritual Entropism}

You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Entropism discipline.

Entropism Rituals use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.84JARbmkQ5r0j39r]{Stolen Time} (SL4)

During a conflict, you may use an action to interfere with the flow of time by spending up to 【SL × 5】 Mind Points. For every 5 Mind Points you spend this way, choose one option: one creature you can see suffers slow; or one creature you can see recovers from slow; or one creature you can see may immediately perform the Equipment action for free; or choose one ally you can see who has yet to take a turn during this round: that ally may take their turn immediately after yours during this round. Each option can only be chosen once per use of this Skill.

ENTROPIST SPELLS

  • For spell breakdown and a list of Entropist Spells, refer to: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.jZeTJrK0mFsRyz8S]{Entropist Rules}

As an action, choose any number of Soul Beads to release in a ranged attack against enemies, spending 2 MP per Bead. Perform a 【DEX + WLP】 Check. On a hit, each target loses 【SL × 4】 HP or MP per Bead, based on your choice. This damage ignores Resistances.

Beads targeting HP aﬀect the target’s Defense, while those targeting MP aﬀect their Magic Defense. Each Bead is destroyed after release, whether it hits or not.

For each pair of active Resolve Soul Beads you possess, choose one of these cumulative benefits:

  • Immunity to a chosen status effect.
  • Your attacks or spells of a chosen damage type ignore Resistances.
  • You gain Resistance to a chosen damage type.

The number of bonuses you can have active at any given moment is equal to 【SL】. You cannot select the same benefit more than once.

After you suffer damage, you may immediately recover 【SL × 2】 Mind Points.

  • You Recover: @GAIN[2*$sl mp]{SL × 2 MP}

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Entropist spell (see Core Rulebook, page 192).

Offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) Entropist spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

  • For spell breakdown and a list of Entropist Spells, refer to: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.jZeTJrK0mFsRyz8S]{Entropist Rules}

You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses 【HR + 15】 Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
